comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: Have we documented our level of support for WSL anywhere? Maybe a known issue? If external people are filing a bunch of issues, it means that they think it might work or should work. We should tell them that we know it doesn't work.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Sure, it could go in the known issues doc - although we want to be clear that WSL is not something we're spending time on right now as it feels like it's much less important than many other scenarios.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Travis CI build stuck again. Looks like webhook payload was not delivered. Doing close-open trick.
